original_title: People’s Leasing upgrades and relocates its Kuliyapitiya Branch
original_body_lines: People’s Leasing & Finance PLC Chairman Pradeep Amirthanayagam (centre) together with Chief Executive Officer / General Manager Shamindra Marcelline (first from right), Senior Deputy General Manager - Head of Branch Network Laksanda Gunawardena (second from right), Chief Manager - Branch Network Susil Priyantha (second from left), PLC Kuliyapitiya Branch Manager Kushan Herath (first from left) at ceremonial relocation of the Kuliyapitiya Branch
Kuliyapitiya Branch of People’s Leasing & Finance (PLC) was relocated to No.21, Madampe Road, Meegahakotuwa, Kuliyapitiya recently.

The new branch location was ceremonially declared open by PLC Chairman Pradeep Amirthanayagam with the presence of Chief Executive Officer / General Manager Shamindra Marcelline, Senior Deputy General Manager - Head of Branch Network Laksanda Gunawardena, Chief Manager - Branch Network Susil Priyantha, PLC Kuliyapitiya Branch Manager Kushan Herath. Kuliyapitiya Branch was opened in 2011 to cater for the financial needs of both retail and corporate customers of the area. Kuliyapitiya Branch was relocated promising greater convenience, quality and accessibility to customers and the Branch Team invites the most valued customers to visit the relocated branch to experience a superior service.
